alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:47PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Seneca, southeastern Wood and northeastern Hancock Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Baltimore, or 11 miles north of Findlay, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tiffin, Fostoria, North Baltimore, Arcadia, Van Buren, New Riegel, Bloomdale, Bettsville, Risingsun, Cygnet, Jerry City, West Millgrove, Bairdstown, Bascom and Kansas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Ohio.
